isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE / 2000 4000 and 8000 MODELS BUILT OCTOBER 1, 1998 AND AFTER - ALLISON WT TRANSMISSION WITH WTEC III ELECTRONIC CONTROLS - ELECTRICAL OPERATION - GROUND SYSTEM

svcproc.title: GROUND SYSTEM
svcproc.para: The WTEC III control system has three ground circuits. Circuit 144, is an ECU signal ground circuit that is grounded to the ECU bracket by connector (229). Circuits 186 and 188 going to a splice and then circuit 94-GC, connector (377), circuit 94-GC and 11-GL to cab ground, which provide a ground for the shift selector (420).
